tool_description: Generates optimal discount strategies based on product data, customer segments, inventory levels, and business constraints to maximize revenue and achieve campaign objectives.

product_ids.description: Products to include in discount strategy

campaign_objective.description: Primary campaign goal: revenue_maximization, inventory_clearance, market_share, customer_acquisition

budget_constraint.description: Maximum budget for discounts in dollars

error_messages: Invalid product IDs: One or more product IDs not found in catalog.
Invalid target segments: One or more customer segments not recognized.
Invalid campaign objective: Use one of [revenue_maximization, inventory_clearance, market_share, customer_acquisition].
Invalid constraints: minimum_margin must be 0-100, max_discount_percentage must be 1-90, budget_constraint must be positive.
Conflicting constraints: Current constraints make profitable discount strategy impossible.
Invalid campaign duration: campaign_duration_days must be between 1 and 365.
usage: Provide product_ids, target_segments, and campaign_objective. Optionally set budget, margin, and discount constraints. Returns optimized discount strategies with expected outcomes.

expected_revenue_impact.description: Projected revenue change from discount strategy

target_segment_allocation.description: Which segments should receive which discount levels
